tool_description: Identifies specific gaps between project characteristics and grant requirements, providing actionable recommendations to address misalignments and strengthen proposal competitiveness.

alignment_data.description: JSON string containing alignment analysis results

critical_threshold.description: Threshold score below which gaps are considered critical (0-100)

error_messages: Invalid alignment data: alignment_data must be valid JSON containing alignment analysis results.
Missing required fields: alignment_data must contain alignment scores and criterion information.
Invalid threshold: critical_threshold must be between 0 and 100.
usage: Provide alignment_data from alignment analysis and optionally set critical_threshold for gap severity classification. Returns structured gap analysis with recommendations.

critical_gaps.description: Most serious alignment gaps requiring attention

moderate_gaps.description: Moderate gaps that could be improved

gap_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations to address identified gaps

risk_level.description: Overall risk assessment: low, moderate, or high
